CustomField.description: The number of seconds that have been spent talking on internal calls which have been established from one user to another within the organisation from the perspective of the From party. Specifically this statistic only includes calls where the user initiated the call and doesn't include any subsequent dialogues/ calls where the user had a call transferred to them.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Internal From Talk Seconds as Primary
CustomField.label: Internal From Talk Seconds as Primary
